title: Everything you ever wanted to know about D-Day, but were afraid to ask
itunes:title: Everything you ever wanted to know about D-Day, but were afraid to ask
itunes:subtitle: Military historian Peter Caddick-Adams responds to listener queries and popular search enquiries about one of the defining episodes of World War Two. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
In the latest of our new series tackling the big questions on major historical topics, military historian Peter Caddick-Adams responds to listener queries and popular search enquiries about one of the defining episodes of World War Two. Historyextra.com/podcast



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
